title: Fix missing Reviews visibility and restore reliable admin management experience

requirements.text: Ensure the Reviews (rating) section is discoverable from the main navigation by adding a visible navigation link to the existing landing-page Reviews section (id="reviews") in both desktop and mobile header navigation.

quotes: Where is rating thing and only 1 admin chamges

acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page, the header navigation includes a "Reviews" link on desktop and in the mobile menu.
Clicking the "Reviews" nav link scrolls/navigates to the existing Reviews section (#reviews).
No user-facing navigation labels are hardcoded in Header.tsx; use the centralized copy config (frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts) as the single source of truth for nav labels/targets where applicable.

requirements.text: Fix/restore the admin allowlist management flow so that an admin can add additional admin principals and remove admins from the Admin Panel, with clear English success/error states and immediate UI refresh after changes.

quotes: Where is rating thing and only 1 admin chamges

acceptanceCriteria: As an admin, opening the Admin Panel shows an Admin Management area that lists current admin principals.
As an admin, adding a valid principal ID succeeds and the new principal appears in the admin list without a manual page refresh.
As an admin, removing an admin principal succeeds and the removed principal disappears from the list without a manual page refresh.
Backend enforces admin-only access for viewing/modifying the admin list and returns clear English error messages for unauthorized access.
Backend prevents removing the last remaining admin and returns a clear English error message that the UI can display.

requirements.text: Make admin availability and access state easier to understand for signed-in users by ensuring the header shows the correct admin entry points based on backend state: show “Set up admin access” only when and only when no admins exist yet, and show “Admin” only for admins.

quotes: I am not able to see any go live option here
Where is rating thing and only 1 admin chamges

acceptanceCriteria: When the user is signed in and the backend reports no admins exist, the header shows a “Set up admin access” button.
When the backend reports admins exist, the “Set up admin access” button is not shown.
When the signed-in user is an admin, the header shows an “Admin” button that opens the Admin Panel.
When the signed-in user is not an admin, the header does not show the “Admin” button.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components must be composed, not edited).
Do not edit immutable auth/actor bootstrap hooks: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; introduce backend/migration.mo only if a state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Adding new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Implementing real-time updates via WebSockets or third-party services.
Changing the overall landing page section order beyond making the existing Reviews section discoverable via navigation.
